1152222222211.content:
Anthony had just swallowed the seed when, out of the blue, he thought of Etna from Disgaea. Anthony had lusted after her for a short time and had wanted to “have fun” with her. But, there was only one problem: she was not real. However, that was about to change…..

Anthony thought it was weird to think of her at that exact moment, but, he was alone so he went upstairs to pleasure himself. As he started, he felt a pain in his throat. At first, Anthony thought it was no big deal, just a piece of that horrible tasting apple, so he got back into his “fun.”

As he was ready to spill his milk, the pain started to intensify. The pain was like no other. It felt like a steam roller was coming up his throat!

He took his hand out of his pants and started to clutch his throat in pain. He started to upchuck…. And an egg fell out. Anthony was shocked, he had never expected THAT to come out of his throat. Anthony stared, as the egg grew in a fast like motion, until it was about his height. Then, before his eyes, the egg cracked open to reveal… Etna?

Is Etna acting like she has the "real" Etna's personality or is she just being a mindless drone?
1152222222211.title: Etna? In REAL life!

choices: Make out with her and then have sex with her
11522222222111.content:
You are looking at Etna, trying to make sense of what is going on, as before this moment, the thought of it being possible that you being able to spit out an egg larger than your mouth, when you didn't even eat any eggs, and then hatching into fictional girl was impossible, but the proof otherwise was sitting in front of you. Etna stands up, stretches a little, then looks around. Upon seeing you, a smile appears on her face, and not the sinister or sneaky looks you'd expect from her. She walks up to you, making you nervous that she is up to something.

"Hello, master!" She says, kneeling in front of you. Your eyes widen and your mouth drops, and if this was an anime, it would have hit the floor.

"What do you...How are you...What's going..." You stammer, unable to form complete sentances due to surpise.

"Master, do you plan to finish any of these questions?" Etna asks.

"I'm just so confused." You reply, scratching your head. You take a deep breath. "Ok, first question, how are you here. Second question, what do you mean master? You don't even call Laharl master, and you're his vassel. Also, please stand." Etna does so.

"Ok, in that order, I'm not the "real" Etna, I'm a copy of her created by a magic seed in the apple you ate..." Etna begins, doing the finger motion for quotes as she says the word real.

"Hold on." You interupt. "You mean to tell me that you were created by a magic seed that created an egg with you inside it? I'm sorry, but I'm not sure I buy it."

"Well master, the proof is right in front of you." Etna replies with a shrug. You conceded to her point. "Getting back to your previous question, I call you master, since that is what you are to me. Any replicas you create with your powers will be mindless slaves that will do whatever you want them to.

"Ok, if that's the case, why do you have emotions?" You ask.

"I don't." Etna replies. Before you can reply she says "I'm just acting like I do since I figured you'd like me like this better than just acting as my natural mindless self. Other than my obedience to you, and acting kind to you, I'll act like the "real" Etna would unless you say otherwise." She once again does the finger motion for quotes while saying real. "You can do many things to me. You can have me act the part of a living doll or robot, possess me in various ways, have me act with any personality you want, or even make me do things by ordering me mentally instead of doing it out loud. You can also make other girls become like me by possessing them."

"Ok... So you'll do anything I say?" You ask, to which she nods. You decide to test it.

"I'm a flat chested bimbo!" You make Etna says in a cheerful tone and grin. After she finishes, she pouts. "That was mean, master."

"I was testing out what you said, as I know you wouldn't ever say those things otherwise." You explain. "Besides, it's not like you really care according to what you told me."

"True, but I'm acting as close to the actual Etna as I can, given the fact that I can't do anything negative to you, and the actual Etna wouldn't be happy about saying that." Etna replies.

"Alright, now that I know for sure that you're telling the truth, it's time for me to do something I really want to do." You say.

"What would that be master?" Etna asks.

What do you want to do?

11522222222221212222222.title: Line of Shikigami Power

115222222222212122222222.content:
(switching to 3rd person because it's easier)

For a long time, Anthony had been trying to clear the extra stage in Perfect Cherry Blossom. Only two days ago had he succeeded, and rejoiced. That was, until he found out there was another extra stage right after that, to which his reaction would probably be summed up as "OHGOD WHAT I HAVE TO DO THAT AGAINARRRGRRGGGHGHG!!!!"

After attempting the stage, Anthony found out Yukari Yakumo was the boss. He didn't get very far at all. Now, he decided, "I'll try it again."

Before he could, though, he felt something huge in his mouth. Something too big. Anthony spat out the object, which happened to be an egg. Very confused, he touched it, and the egg started to crack where his finger was.

What came out of the egg was one naked but pleasantly surprised Yukari Yakumo, smiling at a shocked Anthony.

"Hello." The girl said. "How shall I serve you today?"

Anthony just sat there. A rather obvious tent was starting to form in his pants, and he didn't care if she noticed or not. Plus, the implications of what she said....
115222222222212122222222.title: Border Manipulation

1152222222222121222222222.content:
Before he could really make a decision, or even think of what was going on something else, somehow, came out of the egg. Something that simply set Anthony's mind even further into shock mode. Another woman seemed to sit up in the egg, looking a bit tired as she yawned and stretched. This woman was instantly recognized by Anthony as well. She was slender, very curvaceous, a bright blonde with fox ears on her head and a glaringly obvious nine golden tails attached to her lower back. It was Ran Yakumo, Yukari Yakumo's shikigami, or servant and the extra stage boss, as well as phantasm stage mid boss of touhou 7. Very, very powerful. The only thing that could've made it more obvious was if she were in her usual attire. Which she wasn't. In fact she too had just as much a lack of clothing as Yukari. W-well if Yukari was here then I guess where else would Ran be?

"Mmm, have we arrived Yukari-sama?" Ran asked formally as though it were expected. W-was this on purpose? Wait, if Yukari was here and so Ran was here as a result, then didn't that mean if Ran was here then as a result... "*Yaaaawwn*...Ran-Shama..." Came the mutterings of what sounded like a young girl when lo and behold, the very girl he expected crawled up to the edge of the egg as well. A young looking, maybe 8-9 year old girl at least as she looked appeared with dark brown hair and cat ears on her head, on of them pierced with a big golden hoop. Her two swishing black tails were much smaller than Ran's but they weren't supposed to compare. This girl showed two sharp fangs in her mouth as she yawned and her eyes were slitted like a cats. Chen was this girl's name. The stage 2 boss and extra stage mid boss. The weakest of the three but definitely not 'weak'. Did they all really fit in there? I guess it wouldn't be impossible for Yukari...Augh, he was thinking like this was no big deal! W-wait, were those collars on all of them? Yeah, they were all wearing pet collars, like a dog would wear!

"Take a look around Ran. I'd expect you to be more perceptive than that. We're at our new home~" She said cheerily, nothing else in her voice. New home? W-what? At least two of the most powerful people in Gensokyo suddenly pop up into his room from an egg that came from his mouth and they call this place home?! He needed an explanation and a damn moment to think!

"Hold up! Just stop for a second! Please, what is going on here?! In order, why did you sprout from an egg from my mouth, why are you naked, why did you ask how you can serve me, and why are you calling my home yours?" Anthony asked them in an assertive way. He wasn't one for trying to piece together other's ramblings.

"My apologies Master, Ran and Chen, please be quiet." She ordered her two underlings. She stood up in her bountifully curved beauty and stepped out of the egg onto the actual carpet of his room and proceeded to sit on her knees facing him. "We arrived like that mostly because of you. You summoned us to be your slaves. Why? Well because I was craving such a handsome master as you~ Or at least that's the explanation you can comprehend. We are like this because we are customizable as you see fit and we will wait obediently for you to decide what we wear~" So it was all her doing after all... wait, master?!

"Of course, the collars are a symbol I added to show our connection to you~ As for why I asked how to serve you? Well, your power absolutely labeled me as your slave so it's only natural. And of course by extension, Ran and Chen as well~" She explained before beckoning to two. Ran and Chen both stood, Chen more energetically than Ran, and walked out of the egg shell as well, sitting down in a similar fashion as Yukari. Ran on her left, Chen on her right. The differences between them became easy to compare. Chen had such a small body compared to them. Yukari and Ran were very close in sizes but Ran just barely outdid her master overall. Not by 'too' much though....w-wait, why was he paying attention to that?!

"And lastly, seeing as we will be serving you as you see fit, is it wrong to call this place our home? Maybe you have doghouses already prepared for us?" She said in a way that almost sounded little like it was trying to guilt-trip him but, scarily enough, it was counter-acted by a hint of excitement... "I hope those are sufficient answers. Ran, Chen, say hi~" She looked to them both and then back to Anthony. "Hello master, it is wonderful to meet you. I hope I can satisfy you in every way." Ran was first with a surprisingly...determined promise of pleasing him. Kitsunes do supposedly make great wives... "Hello master~ I'm Chen! Please let me serve you plenty!" Chen sounded very excited as she introduced herself. He wouldn't lie, it was pretty cute.

"R-right. That's about as good of an explanation as I'm going to get I suppose...A-and this 'power' you said I had?" He knew it might've been rude but he asked another question. They were supposedly obedient, right? "Ah yes, a power that lets you summon any girl you can imagine from any fictional work or even real life. You can still use it however you like and on whomever you like but it can be a painful process at first so please use it sparingly at first master, don't hurt yourself~" Yukari explained his power rather thoroughly actually. Well...today is being quite eventful...it was still hard to believe that Yukari, one of THE most powerful touhou characters was right in front of him as HIS slave...wait a minute.

"What about YOUR power?" He asked slightly cautiously, already knowing a bit about it but wanting to bring it up. Yukari's grin grew as she looked at him. "Manipulation of gaps, borders and boundaries? Oh it's nothing 'too' special, just enough to play god and do whatever I, or in this case whatever 'you', wish~" She responded promisingly in an almost tempting tone...If his tent had died down any time in the previous conversation, it was back now. As far as he noticed anyways. He was surprised a bit ago and he still was but this was sounding an awful lot like the break of breaks. If this was a dream...maybe he didn't want to wake up.

"Well for now, what I want is..."

11522222222222222222222222222222222221.title: Shantae (character)?

115222222222222222222222222222222222211.content:
You were spending your day relaxing in your room while playing Shantae on your Nintendo 3DS. Eventually, you began to wonder what it would be like if you had your own genie. Out of nowhere, you started to feel indigestion. This feeling lead to a feeling of vomit coming up.

You started gagging on a mysterious object in your throat, eventually bringing a fist to your stomach to try forcing it out. Finally, you spit it out, and found that it was an egg. This egg began to grow about an inch every second, cracking more and more.

In horror, you jumped behind your bed, and watched it grow. Holes began to form in the egg. Eventually, You could see something move around in the shell. Soon, a hand popped out of it, leaving you to let out a shriek in fear.

Another arm popped out of the eggshell. After what felt like forever, something finally collapsed out of the thing, causing you to duck in terror.

Minutes passed and you began to wonder why nothing had probed you yet. Out of curiosity, you peaked up from your hiding spot to find out what this creature was. Shock was the only thing to describe what you felt, as you saw the brown skin and purple hair of the character you had just played as on the floor of your bedroom, naked as can be. 1222.content:
You've always liked Hermione Granger. Oh, she has a few annoying qualities, but she's clearly as good a witch (or wizard, heck) as any in Hogwarts, and even in the books she's pretty hot -- leaving aside Emma Watson who plays her in the movies. The strange ability you've gotten from the magic seed kicks in, and with a bit of pain you cough up and spit out something resembling an egg. In moments, it's grown large enough to contain the body of a young woman, and a few minutes later it hatches and out of it comes Hermione Granger in her Hogwarts uniform with Griffindor colors. She's got a wand hanging from a loop at her waist, and you wonder whether she can actually use it to work magic. She stands up and faces you, a blank and essentially mindless expression on her attractive face rather than the intelligent look you'd associate with Hermione.

"How may I serve you, Master?" She asks in monotone. She's definitely not Emma Watson -- she's as pretty, but her face is definitely different, and her voice and even her accent -- but if she were an actress, she'd be an even better cast as Hermione than Miss Watson was. She looks about seventeen.

"Don't call me Master, although, yes, I am your master." You say. "If you need to address me by name, my name's Anthony. If you can, look intelligent, and also talk and behave normally for Hermione Granger, as if she were a real girl and you were her." The blank expression leaves her face and she looks alert and... well, not unintelligent, but there's something missing in her.

"I'll do the best I can." She says, sounding slightly nervous. "But essentially, I'm mindless. I'm a set of memories and behaviours," -- You find yourself thinking you can actually hear the British spelling when she says that -- "but there isn't really any `me' to me."

"Do you know how to work magic?" You ask her.

"I still know how to use magic." She says. "All of the servants you get can use all of their abilities from their series, and I can cast a spell for you, if you wish."
1222.title: Hermione Granger

You realized that any egg or eggs you ate (if had eaten any, which you hadn't) would have probably been digested when you puked, but the egg showed no signs of stomach acid damage.

You take up the egg in your hand and notice it has grown larger than your mouth, to your surprise. You hurry upstairs and wrap the egg in a towel before the egg grows even bigger, to about the size of your head in fact, and you have to cover it in a small blanket.

This show was great in your mind, good characters, lots of action as well as some points that made you want to jump up and cheer and other times cry, however there was one thing you and many other Fairy tail male fan as well as some females could agree with.

Most of the female characters in this anime were made to be fan service and one character which you and many you were sure got that was a women name Mirajane Strauss.

Sweet, beautify, smart and with long sliver hair this character had so many clothing changed which showed off her feminine figure it was no wonder your mind instantly thought about her as you picked up the DVD box set you had from you room. However, it was then you suddenly found it hard to breath.

"What the,," you said dropping the box set as you held your neck. It felt like your were choke and rushing to the bathroom to get a drink from the sink, you only turned the tap on when suddenly you throw up.

"Oh man" you said finally happy to breath again. However as you looked into the sink as we all do tend to do when we're sick you didn't see any sick. In fact, all you saw was a pink egg a little bigger then your mouth sitting under the running tap water.

Now this really was freaky to you. You coughed up an pink egg? Now usually you would simply take this egg and throw it in the bin as well, eggs are not meant to be pink. However being curious you take the egg out the water and trying it with one of the towel in your bathroom. You carefully then carried the egg back to your room.

Now like most eggs you thought that if this egg was going to hatch you guessed it had to be warm, so wrapping it in your clothes pile your mum ironed yesterday you made a funny look nest with the egg inside. Now you always knew someone had to sit on the egg however you weren't feeling very bird mommy you decided a hot water bottle would be good enough. So rushing downstairs to your kitchen you begin to boil your house kettle to prepare the water.

Yet while this was going on the egg itself started to crack and as you came rushing back up stairs a few minutes later with a boiling hit water bottle wrapped in a towel, you enter your room only to see Mirajane standing on the pile of clothes where the egg was.

Dressed in her usual clothing when she works in the bar, she stood there until you said hi which caused her to....

15512.title: Ying (bad guys)

choices: Make her your maid, the ultimate irony
155121.content:
You start thinking about one of the newer villains, Yin Wi from the Legend of the Dragon cartoon, when all of a sudden you feel a pain in you stomach. You start coughing and then all of a sudden an egg flies out of your mouth. Staring dumbfounded at the egg, you notice that it's hatching. In a matter of seconds the egg has split open and standing in front of you is a perfect replication of Yin Wi herself!

Walking around the villainess, you're quite surprised to see that she even has the power band. So you're also kinda surprised when she says "What are your orders master?".

Thinking for a second, you decide to try a command out first, which was rather strange, considering Yin Wi doesn't usually take orders.

"First, start speaking like Yin Wi." You order. "Now, empower your band." You add.

"Empower the Shadow Rat!" Yin Wi announces, changing into her powered up form.

Now you're excited, but what should you get her to do next?
155121.title: Yin Wi, your first slave.

choices: Suddenly your sister arrives home, and asks you questions about Yin Wi.
1551211.content:
You quickly think of a question to ask Yin Wi.

"Can your form generate any clothes I order you to wear?" You ask.

"Yes master." She replies, in a mixed tone of her regular voice, and that of a servant.

Smiling you order "Change your clothes into a maid's outfit!" As this is said, her entire clothing starts to shift. Her bodily appearance stays the same, but her clothes are completely different, being a maid's outfit now.

"Now, I want you to start cleaning the house." You say, as Yin Wi walks off to do her work.
1551211.title: Make her your maid, the ultimate irony

choices: Tell your sis to chill out, have Yin Wi bring in your sis's new trends.
15512111.content:
As you head off to the lounge, your sister walks in through the front door "Anthony, get your ass out here, I need someone to bring my shopping bags in!" She shouts, ordering you around.

You just smile "I don't think so sis." You say. "Oh Yin Wi!" You command,

As your sister opens her mouth to insult you, Yin Wi (now powered down) teleports into the room. "Anthony, who's she?" Your sis asks.

"Who do you think?" You reply with a smirk.

"Oh c'mon, that couldn't be the real Yin Wi, she's a cartoon" Your sis says.

You just smile and command "Yin Wi, empower."

"Empower the Shadow Rat!" Yin Wi shouts, her regular powered up costume appearing.

To say your sis is surprised is an understatement. "Ok Anthony, take it easy now."
15512111.title: Suddenly your sister arrives home, and asks you...

choices: Possess her, its sounds like fun.
Get Yin Wi to let go and bring the bags in.
155121112.content:
"I don't think so Sarah." You say, ready to take revenge for the times she and her friends had humiliated you. "Yin Wi, grab her!" You command, Yin Wi doing a stylish flip over your surprised sister, and putting her in a lock.

"Anthony stop!" She says "Or I'm telling mom and dad!"

Yin Wi looks at you "Master, would you like to possess her?" She asks.

"How?" You reply, noting your sis's shocked face.

Yin Wi explained the process you have to go through to enter her body, so what are you going to do?
155121112.title: REVENGE TIME!

choices: Don't care about it, possess her first
1551211121.content:
"No way, you're not going to do this are you?" She asks as she is beginning to fear.

"As you think, sis, I'm going to have some fun being you." You reply. You start to melt yourself down into liquid as your sister is surprised to see you do that.

"No, Anthony, or else I'm really to go to tell mom and dad!" She shouted.

info.brief_description: You eat a magic seed; now you can create replicas of fictional girls and possess girls.
info.description:
You are a boy named Anthony. One day you accidentally swallow a magic seed, soon after you think about a fictional girl and you somehow spit out an egg that is slightly bigger than your mouth, the soon grows to a size that could contain the girl you thought about, hatches into the girl, but without a mind or free will, she has all of the original's memories, and is your obedient servant. Now you can spit out an egg of a fictional girl the same way whenever you want to, but it will hurt your throat, so you can't do it too many times in a short period of time. Because of the seed, you can also now turn into liquid, and enter a girl's body through any opening in her body, if it is a girl who isn't your servant, then she will become just like one of your fictional girl servants if you want her to.

You can control any of your fictional girl servants with your mind, make them be living puppets or living dolls, make them living robots, transfer your spirit into one of their bodies, physically enter their bodies and take over them in several ways, make them say anything you want them to by thinking it, and make a personality for them that you can change or take away at any time. You can undo anything that I mentioned above any time you want.

Rules:

No gay/lesbian stuff or incest (although you can have fun with a female family member's body if you want, just so long as you don't have sex with them).

Keep any names of characters the same throughout the story.

No killing off Anthony or ending the story.

You can only do the things I mentioned about with girls, not boys.

No turning Anthony evil or changing his personality.

Only Anthony can gain these abilities.

Use proper grammar and spelling.

No vore or weight gain.

If I find out that someone who adds has stolen someone else's chapter, and then posted it as their own, then I'll delete it.

Characters who can transform between girl forms and boy forms will be in girl form the whole time, with no traces of the boy form.

If there is ever a debate on the gender of a character, then ask me, and I'll decide. Characters that are counted as female:
Haku (There is no way that Haku is a boy in my opinion, for several reasons).
Vivian (In the English version of Paper Mario the Thousand Year Door it is true without a doubt, and by what I understand, the info in the journal about the characters in the Japanese version comes from Mario's point of view, and since Beldam calls Vivian a man during an insult, Mario could quite possibly only believe it to be true).

Any character who in their series is called a god will be considered a powerful spirit instead in this story.

You can have Anthony know about any series you want, or not know about a series.

If there is a character who doesn't have a specific gender, you may create a female version just like you can create a girl who is naturally female.

Please put up a picture of the fictional girls during the option chapter they appear in. (I'll do my best to edit the chapters already up to include images). Don't hesitate to use pictures of what the replica (or Anthony possessing the replica) is doing.

There may be other things I'm forgetting, so everything else is fair game unless I remember anything else and add it.

Anthony: 16 years old. A lone-wolf, but not a mean person and is very stubborn. Will always be there for his friends if he can; become his enemy and you will have a hard time. He is not a lone-wolf towards his friends. Tall, with dark brown hair and dark brown eyes. Wears dark blue jeans or shorts, black shoes, with the shirts he wears being either completely dark blue, completely yellow, completely red, very dark blue with the word Nintendo written on the front, or black with a picture of Sonic on the front.

Other Characters (Note, there are changes, due to the fact that one woman having as many kids as Diana did in the original is unrealistic):

Laura: Anthony's older sister by a few months. 16 years old. She wears brown boots, jeans, and a black shirt. She has blond hair. She is a very selfish person who thinks she is better than everyone else. She still cares for her siblings, and unknown to them, has threatened Sarah to not let Zoey know the truth after kicking her butt, since Zoey cares for her step siblings and step father, and Laura doesn't want to risk Zoey distancing herself from them. Kimberly kept custody of her after the divorce.

Zack: Anthony's older brother. 20 years old. Gets along with Anthony and and the rest of their siblings, except Laura, although both care for each other. Zoey thinks Zack is just a friend of Anthony's. Kimberly kept custody of him after the divorce. Has a crush on Mary, but due to being step siblings, feels awkward about it, so he doesn't tell her. He doesn't know she feels the same way.

Kimberly: Anthony's 42 year old mother. She wears black high heels, a grey skirt, and a grey shirt. She has long brown hair. A very kind person, she cares about other people and tries to help them if they need it. Sad that her family was split apart, but she and Henry just couldn't make it last.

Sarah: Anthony's older step sister. 17 years old. She's shallow, liking only what's popular, and is a real witch (Not literally, just personality wise, and I won't write the word originally used to describe her that was used by the person who created her) towards Anthony and friends. Always dyes her hair to whatever hair color is popular. Fears Laura.

Anna: Anthony's younger step sister. 15 years old. Just started the swim team 3 months ago. She has a long, straight golden hair, average eyes, pointy nose, and her mouth is not big, but not small, and she always smile in front of people, and giggles as she talks, which makes her look cute on the face. She is thin, and moderately short, around 160+cm in height, she has the breast of C-cup sized, it's not that big. She is also good in sports, and intelligent in her work, and she is popular among her age group, but not exactly as popular as school models. She looks up to and respects Anthony. She loves anime and video games. She wears a wide variety of clothes, but wears a green one-piece bathing suit while swimming. She has a crush on Anthony, but feels awkward about it, due to Zoey not knowing, and them being step siblings, so she hides it.

Andy: Anthony's younger brother. 13 years old. Loves video games. Has a crush on Bethany, although she doesn't know (more info will be added when someone expands upon it).

Zoey: Anthony's younger step sister. 10 years old. She is majorly in love with Anthony, but due to thinking that they are actually related, she feels awkward about her feelings and hides them, acting like she just has a brother complex, however, if she found out the truth, she would make no effort to hide her feelings. She likes her friends, and unlike Sarah, she doesn't like populars or following them. She has a shortish, light brown hair in pigtails, amber-colored eyes and a smile that fits greatly on her face. She has normal breasts, not too big because she's so young. She wears mostly skirts and shirts, but she has some jeans, and sometimes she wears dresses, she loves all colors equally, and thus, she has many different colors of clothing. She likes candy (mainly chocolate), playing videogame, and she loves love stories. Anthony likes her too and they've always gotten along. She has the personality of a cute 10 year innocent girl, she wouldn't do anything bad even if forced to. She knows her brother is a nice person and inspires in him. She loves being praised and is a hard worker. Would do everything for her brother.

Mia: Anthony's twin sister who gets along with him very well. Her favorite fictional character is Mia from the Fire Emblem series, because they share the same name, and similar personalities. She naturally has black hair, but always dyes it purple in order to be like her favorite character. She is almost always wearing a skirt or dress. She likes sports (one of the few kinds of things that she doesn't wear a skirt for), but can't stand cheerleaders. She is easily excitable, more so when she has some kind of sugar (which is why she usually isn't allowed by her family to have any when at home or out at a family event).

When she has some kind of sugar, then she gets so hyper that she sometimes starts pulling pranks, although they're never harmful. She is an odd mix of being a tomboy and girly-girl, but gets annoyed with girls who are complete girly-girls. Shares Anthony's love of the sword, anime, and video games, but because of how hyper she is, she hardly ever reads books, because she think they're too boring for the most part.. She's a little faster than Anthony, but a little weaker. She is also a couple minutes younger than him.

Mary: Anthony's older step sister who is in college. 21 years old. Waist length, dark brown hair kept in a ponytail, same eyes as Anthony, shorter than Anthony but athletic. Humble and willing to help out. She enjoys playing video games with Anthony a bit. Likes spending time with friends and Anthony when possible. Adapt at video games somewhat (not as much as Anthony or the others), pretty fast as she almost beat a track record. Nimble as well (as in she could be an excellent thief if she desired) She likes sticking up for people when they feel oppressed, she has a strong sense of justice, and she is a tomboy. Prefers to wear a lavender sweater over a white tank top, along regular jeans and white shoes. She has a crush on Zack, but since they are step siblings, feels awkward about it, and doesn't tell him. She doesn't know that he feels the same way.

Diana: Anthony's step mother. She is a widow, with her late husband being Henry's distant cousin. She married Henry a little over a year after her late husband's death, during that time, Zoey was born. Since Henry has the same last name as her married name, Zoey hasn't been able to find anything weird about it that could cause her to figure out. (This is all for her for now, I'll update it if/when she is used again)

Henry: Anthony's father. 42 years old. Is in the military, but his section hasn't been called in to outside conflict at the time. He is about to begin some military training required, and won't be back for two weeks. He'll either leave while Anthony is at school, or the next day, depending on who is writing. Originally married to Kimberly, but they couldn't make it last. All of his kids blame him for splitting up the family. (more info will be added when someone expands upon it).

Tekki: Anthony's best friend. He's a genius, a loyal friend, and can be a bit random at times. He has white hair and brown eyes, is about a head shorter than Anthony, and just wears general clothes, as he doesn't have a preference.

Amy: She's been friends with Anthony ever since their first day of middle school. She is kind, loyal, and very talented. Her breasts are a good size for her age. She has long, brown hair that she keeps in a ponytail, with blue eyes. The clothes she likes to wear the most are a purple shirt with a black skirt or black shorts. She always wears either a pair of black, knee high boots, a pair of dark blue tennis shoes, or a pair of black high heels, but she always takes the ones she doesn't wear with her (In case she wants to wear another pair at some point) in a purple book bag that she carries around all the time, and who knows what else she has in the book bag?

Gred: A relatively dumb, but extremely muscly and mean quarterback for the school team.

Nancy: The leader of Sarah's popular group and head cheerleader. Blond hair

Jenny: A girl who hangs out with Amy a lot. (In some storylines she can't stand Anthony, but he doesn't know that)

Brianna: 16 years old. She has long white hair, dark skin and bright green eyes. She wears a red, white, and blue jacket with a Puerto Rican flag on the backside. She also wears a pair of pitch black jeans and red and white chucks. Laid back, yet somehow, easily excitable. She loves video games.

If you create a character, then you must give the details about them, such as their appearance and personality.

In this story, you have just finished school for the year.
